title: Dist. Atty. Brooke Jenkins gets a crash course in San Francisco politics
dc:creator: Hannah Wiley
description: Like her predecessor Chesa Boudin, interim San Francisco Dist. Atty. Brooke Jenkins has become a polarizing figure in the city's politics.
content:encoded: Like her predecessor Chesa Boudin, interim San Francisco Dist. Atty. Brooke Jenkins has become a polarizing figure in the city's politics.

media:content.media:description: SAN FRANCISCO CA SEPTEMBER 15, 2022 - San Francisco District Attorney Brooke Jenkins speaks with Maria Araneda, 64, who said she had been homeless all of her life during a tour of the city's most troubled areas areas by the SFFD on Thursday, Sept. 15, 2022 in San Francisco, Calif. (Paul Kuroda / For The Times)
